mapper.select: select w, wid, wpwd, writedate from webmaster where wid=#{wid} and wpwd=#{wpwd}

select * from (select * from (select ROWNUM ,u,uuid,uname,uaddr,utel,uemail,birth,upoint,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from member where ROWNUM <= #{curpage}*#{onepage} order by u desc) order by u) where
ROWNUM <= ((select count(*) from member) - (#{onepage}*(#{totalpage}-1)))
ROWNUM <= #{onepage}
order by u desc

select * from (select * from (select ROWNUM ,m,mid,mname,mtel,memail,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from master where ROWNUM <= #{curpage}*#{onepage} order by m desc) order by m) where
ROWNUM <= ((select count(*) from master) - (#{onepage}*(#{totalpage}-1)))
ROWNUM <= #{onepage}
order by m desc

select * from (select * from (select a,aname,atel,aaddr,atype,acheckin,acheckout,amaxreservedate,atheme,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from accomodation where ROWNUM <= #{curpage}*#{onepage} order by writedate desc) order by writedate) where
ROWNUM <= ((select count(*) from master) - (#{onepage}*(#{totalpage}-1)))
ROWNUM <= #{onepage}
order by writedate desc
